page.title: 20HELSTON FIRE STATION
page.content: On Monday 1st July Class Two visited the Fire Station. The station officer told us how the firemen save people from fires.Afterwards we went outside and climbed on one of the ladders and sat in a fire engine and a jeep. We were shown four different kinds of helmets worn by firemen and two firemen showed us their special uniform. A helmet with a diamond on the side means that the man wearing it is allowed to wear breathing apparatus. There are fourteen men in the Brigade at the station and they meet every Monday night for practice.
